author: Al Jazeera
title: Ukraine leader pledges to stay put as Russia troops approach Kyiv
description: Zelenskyy says he is Moscow’s ‘number one target’ as Russian forces seize Chernobyl plant and advance on capital Kyiv.
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has promised to stay in Kyiv as his troops battle Russian military advancing towards the capital in the biggest attack on a European state since World War Two.… [+4778 chars]
